0.5.0 January 3, 2009

* Bugfixes and api improvements that simplify usage
* New examples added
* Added a method to ctags_base and exuberant_ctags classes that generate ctags_file object instances directly
* Separated tag data collection from parsing, making the parsing interface lighter
* Python 3000 compatibility


0.4.0 December 13, 2008

* Initial release.
